alert.note: Alert for Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 2:05PM EST until February 07 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light wintry mix of snow, sleet, and freezing rain. Total snow and sleet accumulation a coating to an inch. A glaze of ice accumulation from freezing rain. * WHERE...Northern Virginia Blue Ridge and Central Virginia Blue Ridge. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge
